name: Doomsday Jetlag
description:
Choose your jet, suit up & get into the thick of it. Doomsday Jetlag follows lone heroes as they dogfight the hounds of hell coming to bring nuclear armageddon to the lands below. Along the way, skill up your pilot to attain radical upgrades to make the fight a little more even, bolster the defenses of the lands you are protecting & find cards to equip powerful abilities in your next runs!

After a hard day's work saving the good people back on terra firma take your winnings back to the hangar and buy new jets or upgrade old ones for your next round of heroism. Fight off all kinds of jets, bombers, ships, missiles & nuclear warheads in your quest to delay the end of the world from your cockpit, one burst of molten lead at a time!



Collect useful abilities and power-ups to aid you in battle!



Save the world and use your reward money to upgrade your jets or buy new ones!



As you level up your jets attempt missions across the world in more challenging maps!
